languages.text: "И вот еще что. Утеря грамоты — величайший грех, госпожа Хейдари. Единожды лишившись оригинала, вы более не сможете восстановить свое положение. Даже с заверением Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "И вот еще что. Утеря грамоты — величайший грех, госпожа Хейдари. Единожды лишившись оригинала, вы более не сможете восстановить свое положение. Даже с заверением Вольного Торговца".

languages.text: "And one more thing — loss of the certificate is a grievous transgression, Mistress Heydari. Lose the original document, and you will be unable to regain your status as an official trade representative. Not even with the Rogue Trader's endorsement."
languages.original_text: "И вот еще что. Утеря грамоты — величайший грех, госпожа Хейдари. Единожды лишившись оригинала, вы более не сможете восстановить свое положение. Даже с заверением Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "And one more thing — loss of the certificate is a grievous transgression, Mistress Heydari. Lose the original document, and you will be unable to regain your status as an official trade representative. Not even with the Rogue Trader's endorsement."

"And one more thing — loss of the certificate is a grievous transgression, Mistress Heydari. Lose the original document, and you will be unable to regain your status as an official trade representative. Not even with the Rogue Trader's endorsement."

"And one more thing — loss of the certificate is a grievous transgression, Mistress Heydari. Lose the original document, and you will be unable to regain your status as an official trade representative. Not even with the Rogue Trader's endorsement."

"And one more thing — loss of the certificate is a grievous transgression, Mistress Heydari. Lose the original document, and you will be unable to regain your status as an official trade representative. Not even with the Rogue Trader's endorsement."

languages.text: “还有一件事情——如果你弄丢这份执照，那会是严重的违法行为，海达利女士。若是你弄丢了原件，那你身为帝国官方贸易代表的地位也会被一并剥夺，哪怕是有行商浪人的保证也不行。”
languages.original_text: "And one more thing — loss of the certificate is a grievous transgression, Mistress Heydari. Lose the original document, and you will be unable to regain your status as an official trade representative. Not even with the Rogue Trader's endorsement."

traits.locale_text: “还有一件事情——如果你弄丢这份执照，那会是严重的违法行为，海达利女士。若是你弄丢了原件，那你身为帝国官方贸易代表的地位也会被一并剥夺，哪怕是有行商浪人的保证也不行。”

languages.text: «Una cosa más: perder el certificado constituiría una transgresión monumental, señora Heydari. Si pierde el documento original, no podrá recuperar su estatus de representante comercial oficial. Aunque le avale {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "And one more thing — loss of the certificate is a grievous transgression, Mistress Heydari. Lose the original document, and you will be unable to regain your status as an official trade representative. Not even with the Rogue Trader's endorsement."

traits.locale_text: «Una cosa más: perder el certificado constituiría una transgresión monumental, señora Heydari. Si pierde el documento original, no podrá recuperar su estatus de representante comercial oficial. Aunque le avale {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: 「それともうひとつ――認定書を紛失した場合、重大な罪に問われます、ミストレス・ヘイダリ。原本を紛失すると公式貿易代表者としての地位を再取得することはできません。自由開拓者の支援があっても、です」
languages.original_text: "And one more thing — loss of the certificate is a grievous transgression, Mistress Heydari. Lose the original document, and you will be unable to regain your status as an official trade representative. Not even with the Rogue Trader's endorsement."

traits.locale_text: 「それともうひとつ――認定書を紛失した場合、重大な罪に問われます、ミストレス・ヘイダリ。原本を紛失すると公式貿易代表者としての地位を再取得することはできません。自由開拓者の支援があっても、です」

languages.text: « Une dernière chose, avant que vous partiez. La perte de votre certificat est une grave entorse au règlement, maîtresse Heydari. Si vous égarez le document original, vous ne pourrez plus jamais prétendre au titre de représentante officielle au commerce. Pas même avec l'appui {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "And one more thing — loss of the certificate is a grievous transgression, Mistress Heydari. Lose the original document, and you will be unable to regain your status as an official trade representative. Not even with the Rogue Trader's endorsement."

traits.locale_text: « Une dernière chose, avant que vous partiez. La perte de votre certificat est une grave entorse au règlement, maîtresse Heydari. Si vous égarez le document original, vous ne pourrez plus jamais prétendre au titre de représentante officielle au commerce. Pas même avec l'appui {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: "Und eines noch – der Verlust des Zertifikats ist eine schwere Verfehlung, Herrin Heydari. Solltet Ihr das Originaldokument verlieren, könnt Ihr Euren Status als offizielle Handelsrepräsentantin nicht zurückerhalten. Nicht einmal mit der Empfehlung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: "And one more thing — loss of the certificate is a grievous transgression, Mistress Heydari. Lose the original document, and you will be unable to regain your status as an official trade representative. Not even with the Rogue Trader's endorsement."

traits.locale_text: "Und eines noch – der Verlust des Zertifikats ist eine schwere Verfehlung, Herrin Heydari. Solltet Ihr das Originaldokument verlieren, könnt Ihr Euren Status als offizielle Handelsrepräsentantin nicht zurückerhalten. Nicht einmal mit der Empfehlung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}."

languages.text: "Son bir mesele daha var... Tasdiknamenin kaybedilmesi ağır bir suçtur Üstat Heydari. Belgenin aslını kaybederseniz resmî ticaret temsilciliği makamına bir daha asla gelemezsiniz. Hür Tacir kefil olsa bile bu böyle."
languages.original_text: "And one more thing — loss of the certificate is a grievous transgression, Mistress Heydari. Lose the original document, and you will be unable to regain your status as an official trade representative. Not even with the Rogue Trader's endorsement."

traits.locale_text: "Son bir mesele daha var... Tasdiknamenin kaybedilmesi ağır bir suçtur Üstat Heydari. Belgenin aslını kaybederseniz resmî ticaret temsilciliği makamına bir daha asla gelemezsiniz. Hür Tacir kefil olsa bile bu böyle."
